column2: Imposed  a  MRP  of  Rs.  46  per

- 
Cabinet approval was granted to automate fuel price adjustments based on the 2018
fuel pricing formula with the aim of achieving cost recovery.

- 
Cabinet approval was granted to automate electricity tariff adjustments on a cost
recovery, semi annual basis. Accordingly, end consumer electricity tariffs are to be
adjusted in January and July every year.
